attributes.action: not use a stealth tax on our phone line rentals to subsidise the development of Broadband services in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I object to the use of yet another stealth tax,to subsidise the development of a digital superhighway (high speed broadband services for the UK) There are already too many stealth taxes like those on fuel and VED.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
